partnerships@boldbuffalo.games

The NEXT Step for Content Creators

Expand growth, engagement, and monetization opportunities with a mobile game – tailor-made for your YouTube audience

Bold Buffalo is a mobile game studio specialized in building unique, high-quality mobile games tailored to YouTube content creators audiences.
advantage

Advantage for Our Partners

Partnering with us comes with a range of benefits. Here’s what you can expect when you choose to work with us:

Increased Audience Engagement

Producing high quality, entertaining videos takes time; most YouTube creators can’t produce more than one hour of fresh content per week. This means that audience members are only able to interact with their favorite brands for a small fraction of their free time.

But with a customized companion game available 24/7, your audience can interact with your brand in a fun and innovative way, any time they want – giving you the opportunity to boost engagement and brand loyalty like never before.

Accelerated Audience Growth

While our partners’ games are primarily built for their unique audience, they can also be an excellent way to reach new audiences.

With the ever-growing number of mobile phone players around the world – expected to top 2,000,000,000 very soon and still expanding rapidly – plus the instant accessibility of games on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store, new fans can be drawn to your brand by first discovering your game, then your YouTube channel.

More time, less stress

YouTube content creators work hard to build their brand and grow their audience.

Owning a game that complements your channel and gives your audience the ability to interact with your brand at any time relieves pressure to churn out content, creates time and space for creativity, and gives you the opportunity to slow down without losing momentum.

Strengthened brand resilience

For many creators, their YouTube channel is their primary source of income. That means that unforseen events – like the channel going down, or personal circumstances hindering their ability to produce more content – can have a devastating impact on their brand and livelihood.

That’s why we feel strongly about protecting your business from a single point of failure with a multi-platform strategy (the Apple App Store and Google Play Store vs. YouTube alone) that diversifies revenue streams and makes your brand – and income – more resilient in the face of unexpected events.

Low risk, high reward opportunity for added brand value

We pride ourselves on our transparency and flexibility. Our "walk away at any time, for any reason" policy and fully financed options make developing and launching a customized mobile game with us a low-risk venture, with the potential for substantial rewards.

Leveraging the opportunity to provide your audience with a unique form of entertainment will help you maintain constant presence for your brand, differentiate yourself in a saturated market, and enhance brand value in ways that surpass the limitations of platforms like YouTube.

PARTNERSHIP

How Our Partners Contribute to the Process

We are fully committed to building a fun and successful mobile game for your audience with minimum involvement on your part.
But we can’t do it completely alone.
Here’s what we need to make our relationship a successful one.
Time commitment

We’ll do our very best to minimize the time you need to put into this project. However, some involvement is still necessary to ensure that your game perfectly fits the needs and wants of your audience – and that you are 100% happy with the end result.

In the development phase – which typically takes 4-12 months, depending on game complexity – you can expect bi-montly calls lasting 30 minutes to an hour. Once the game is live, the time commitment scales down to 1 short, monthly call to touch base and plan special game events.

And while it’s essential that our partners continue to promote the game once it’s live (especially to highlight new features and events), we don’t ask for lengthy pitches tacked on each piece of content you produce – just a quick reminder every now and then is enough!

Audience involvement

Although not mandatory, we do encourage our partners to involve their audience in the game conception process to foster a sense of ownership and investment in the game from the outset.

This win-win scenario not only generates heightened excitement and anticipation for the game's launch, increasing its chances for success — it also serves as a simple, effective method for enhancing engagement on your channel, on top of your regular content.

Open communication

Building a successful, profitable mobile game is a continuous process that requires patience and frequent communication.

And while we actively seek out and incorporate audience feedback to make improvements, we also expect our partners to be active participants in this process. Regularly providing user feedback will help us ensure that your game consistently improves to become an ever better fit for your audience.

INVITATION

Partnerships Available by Invitation Only

We love what we do, and we employ an array of highly skilled professionals that help us deliver exceptional results. From project managers, game developers, game artists, sound designers, and testers, building a mobile game is a resource-intensive endeavor.
Because we want to ensure we maintain the capacity to give our partners our full focus, our partnership opportunities are currently available by invitation only.
Minimum eligibility requirements
To maintain our quality standards and ensure our goals are mutually achievable, we require our partners to have a growing, engaged community with a minimum of 500,000 subscribers – or to at least have projections that anticipate reaching that number within 6 to 12 months.
ABOUT

About Us

Content creators are the new rockstars... except they have an ability to connect with their fans in a way that other artists can only dream about.
But we recognize that it takes a large investment of time, effort, and creative energy to maintain momentum and keep growing, and we've seen countless successful YouTubers burn out and step away from all they've built.
That's why we founded Bold Buffalo — to help content creators make their brands more profitable and more sustainable, so they can be in it for the long-haul.

Our brand name reflects our belief that fortune favors the bold — and that the most successful brands are those who take action. Like the American Bison, they aren't made stronger by size alone, but also through speed and agility — seizing opportunities to expand their reach and capitalize on the momentum they've gained.

We're proud to provide this unique opportunity for YouTube content creators who share that spirit of boldness and are ready to take the next step toward greater brand value, diversification, and resilience.

Mel Colmant
Founder

Mel Colmant is a seasoned entrepreneur with a diverse background spanning over 20 years in online business development and IT.

His extensive experience covers a wide range of domains, including online physical and digital products distribution, professional mobile application creation, and IT project management.

This varied experience has given him a unique advantage in understanding the intricacies of different industries and how they intersect with technology – making him exceptionally skilled at providing innovative solutions that are tailored to the specific needs of his clients.

Alex Veretennikov
Lead Developer

Alex is a highly experienced senior unity developer with a proven track record of success in the gaming industry.

With more than 15 years of experience, and having developed over 50 mobile and console games, Alex has gained a deep understanding of the gaming industry and the technical nuances required to create successful products.

In recent years, Alex has taken on leadership roles as both a senior developer and team lead, successfully producing several hit games.

His extensive experience and leadership skills make him a valuable asset to our development team, ensuring the delivery of high-quality, profitable games for our partners.
